localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit

blogPost.excerpt: Invest in Alternative assets like crypto, collectibles, real estate, and more? No more silly spreadsheets to track your Alt investments. Connect your Alt accounts to track your portfolio's performance. Also, discover over 150 new investments on MoneyMade!
blogPost.body: Invest in Alternative assets like crypto, collectibles, real estate, and more? No more silly spreadsheets to track your Alt investments. Connect your Alt accounts to track your portfolio's performance. Also, discover over 150 new investments on MoneyMade!
blogPost.title: MoneyMade - Track all of your alternative investments from one place
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 投资另类资产，如加密、收藏品、房地产等？无需再使用愚蠢的电子表格来跟踪您的Alt投资。连接您的Alt账户来跟踪您的投资组合的表现。此外，在MoneyMade上发现超过150个新投资项目!
localize.tagline: 从一个地方追踪您所有的另类投资

localize.description: 投資另類資產，如加密、收藏品、房地產等？無需再使用愚蠢的電子表格來跟蹤您的Alt投資。連接您的Alt賬戶來跟蹤您的投資組合的表現。此外，在MoneyMade上發現超過150個新投資項目!
localize.tagline: 從一個地方追蹤您所有的另類投資

previous.excerpt: Compose private notes, optionally share them with others and still stay in control of who can access your data. All while having an excellent offline-first experience on all platforms.
previous.title: Serenity Notes - End-to-end encrypted collaborative notes app

localize.description: 撰写私人笔记，有选择地与他人分享，并且仍然可以控制谁可以访问你的数据。同时在所有平台上都能获得出色的离线优先体验。
localize.tagline: 端到端加密的协作笔记应用。

localize.description: 撰寫私人筆記，有選擇地與他人分享，並且仍然可以控制誰可以訪問你的數據。同時在所有平臺上都能獲得出色的離線優先體驗。
localize.tagline: 端到端加密的協作筆記應用。

next.excerpt: With Palette you can add colors to your palette and click to copy the HEX when you need a color.
next.title: Palette - Store and share colors between apps

localize.description: 通过调色板，你可以将颜色添加到调色板中，当你需要一种颜色时，可以点击复制HEX。
localize.tagline: 存储和共享应用程序之间的颜色

localize.description: 通過調色板，你可以將顏色添加到調色板中，當你需要一種顏色時，可以點擊複製HEX。
localize.tagline: 存儲和共享應用程序之間的顏色
